attributes.action: Make a day where we will seek our God and pray for our nation united
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Prayer is a good weapon. There is much crime in this nation and if we were to have just one day to pray for our nation, who knows what can happen. Even if someone doesn't know what to say in a prayer, they should just say what is in their heart. God have mercy. Nothing is working at the moment. Lets turn to prayer.

reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
